parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many. From an absolute pos and hos; interrogative pronoun how much (plural) many).
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Apparently from ereo; to interrogate; by implication, to request.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
